title: The Complete Old Fools Trilogy
description: Also published separately, this is the omnibus of the first three bestselling, hilarious ‘Old Fools’ books, bundled together into one very large volume.It begins with Book 1: ‘Chickens, Mules and Two Old Fools’, followed by Book 2: ‘Two Old Fools ~ Olé!’ and finishes with Book 3: ‘Two Old Fools on a Camel’.The books span the time from when Vicky and Joe relocate to a tiny, crazy, Spanish mountain village, to their year teaching Arab children in Bahrain as the Arab revolution erupts. Includes Spanish and Arabic recipes.
author: Victoria Twead
